metadata.title: School of Information Technology - Tan Tao University
metadata.description: The School of Information Technology at Tan Tao University applies the Liberal Arts - Lifelong Learning philosophy with curricula referenced from Duke University, USA.

hero.subtitle: Tan Tao University's School of Information Technology embraces the Liberal Arts - Lifelong Learning philosophy, empowering students to lead Vietnam's digital transformation.

programs.title: Explore our Academic Programs
programs.subtitle: SIT applies the “Liberal Arts - Lifelong Learning” philosophy with curricula referenced from Duke University (USA) and tailored to Vietnam's digital economy.

features.title: Liberal arts-inspired curriculum
features.description: Foundational liberal arts learning combined with specialised IT modules helps students build critical thinking and adaptable skillsets.

features.title: PhD-level faculty mentors
features.description: Lecturers with doctoral degrees from reputable universities in Vietnam and abroad accompany students through research and practice.

features.title: Modern labs and real projects
features.description: Well-equipped laboratories, industry workshops and competitions connect classroom knowledge with real-world experiences.

programs.financialSupport: Scholarship pathways for graduate studies in Vietnam and abroad

programs.title: Bachelor of Computer Science (Curriculum 2025)
programs.description: Focus tracks in Data Engineering and Software Engineering with strong foundations in algorithms and systems design.
programs.features: Java, Python, C++, Web Development, Mobile Apps, Software Architecture, Data Engineering

programs.title: Bachelor of Computer Science (Curriculum 2025 – Vietnamese)
programs.description: Vietnamese-delivered programme with Data Engineering and Software Engineering orientations aligned with domestic industry needs.
programs.features: Java, Python, C++, Web Development, Mobile Apps, Software Architecture, Data Engineering

programs.title: Bachelor of Computer Science (Curriculum 2021 – English)
programs.description: English-delivered programme preparing students for international postgraduate study and careers.
programs.features: Java, Python, C++, Web Development, Mobile Apps, Software Architecture, Data Engineering

programs.title: Bachelor of Data Science (Curriculum 2025)
programs.description: Specialisations in Bioinformatics and Business Analytics combining statistics, computing and domain knowledge.
programs.features: Data Analytics, Business Intelligence, Bioinformatics, Statistical Modeling, Big Data

programs.title: Bachelor of Artificial Intelligence (Curriculum 2025)
programs.description: Concentrations in Computer Vision and Natural Language Processing with hands-on machine learning projects.
programs.features: Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Computer Vision, Natural Language Processing, Neural Networks

programs.title: Master of Computer Science (Curriculum 2025)
programs.description: Graduate-level research in advanced computing, innovation and collaboration with Tan Tao University's academic ecosystem.
programs.features: Advanced Algorithms, Research Methods, Thesis Project, Industry Collaboration, Innovation

about.title: About SIT
about.subtitle: Leading the Future of Information Technology Education
about.description: SIT nurtures high-quality human resources for Information Technology and Computer Science, aligning with Tan Tao University's mission to accompany the Industry 4.0 revolution.
about.liberalArtsDescription: Students receive broad-based knowledge across social sciences, humanities and natural sciences before specialising, strengthening self-learning and adaptability.
about.lifelongLearningDescription: Graduates are encouraged to pursue lifelong learning, continuously updating professional competencies to meet evolving career demands.
about.qualityAssuranceDescription: Training outcomes, teaching methods and academic management meet national standards while progressing toward regional and global benchmarks.
about.technologyIntegrationDescription: Foreign language proficiency and digital tools are integrated into teaching, learning and administration to satisfy learners, employers and society.
about.transparentEnvironmentDescription: SIT builds an open, transparent workplace that enables every member to maximise their potential while keeping students at the centre.
about.joinEcosystem: Join SIT's learning ecosystem. Contact us today.
about.historyText: The School of Information Technology originated from the Faculty of Engineering, established on 4 January 2012 (Decision No. 82/QD.TTU.12) to deliver Computer Science programmes. The title “School of Information Technology” became official on 1 June 2023 under Decision No. 70/QD-TTU.23.
about.facultyText: The faculty comprises full-time and visiting lecturers. Full-time members hold doctorates from prestigious universities in Vietnam and overseas (Australia, France, USA, Japan, etc.).
about.missionText: Train and develop high-quality human resources in Information Technology and Computer Science; conduct in-depth research and technological applications; pioneer liberal arts and lifelong learning models aligned with regional and global standards.
about.visionText: By 2030, SIT aims to be a top-tier Vietnamese institution for training, research and technology transfer in IT and Computer Science, with accredited programmes and extensive domestic and international cooperation.
about.valuesText: Maintain a trustworthy academic environment focused on teaching well, learning well and placing students at the centre.

liberalArts.title: Liberal Arts
liberalArts.description: Liberal arts modules are curated across disciplines, encouraging free thinking and equipping students with self-study and adaptation skills.

lifelongLearning.title: Lifelong Learning
lifelongLearning.description: Graduates cultivate a lifelong learning mindset to enhance expertise, responsibility and collaboration in diverse work environments.

about.organizationText: The School structure includes: (1) Faculty Council, (2) Leadership Board, (3) Office Division, (4) Academic Departments.
about.qualityPolicyText: SIT commits to outcome-based education, continuous improvement of teaching, learner-centred assessment, technological integration and a transparent academic culture.

students.title: Student Life
students.subtitle: Empowering Future Technology Leaders
students.description: SIT supports students with advising, research, competitions and community engagement, ensuring every learner can thrive academically and professionally.

supportServices.title: Academic advising
supportServices.description: Personalised study planning aligned with programme structures and graduate pathways.

supportServices.title: Career services
supportServices.description: Internships, mentoring and connections with industry partners in Vietnam and overseas.

supportServices.title: Research cohorts
supportServices.description: Opportunities to join faculty-led research, competitions and innovation projects.

supportServices.title: Student clubs & workshops
supportServices.description: Technology clubs, seminars and soft-skill workshops organised throughout the year.
